summary: This is an FBI 302 form documenting an interview with a female victim (referred to as 'Victim-1') conducted on February 27, 2020. The victim describes in detail the grooming process, sexual abuse, and psychological manipulation she endured from Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, starting when she was a teenager. She discusses the dynamics of their relationship, group abuse scenarios, travel on Epstein's private jet, and the long-term impact on her life. This is an FBI 302 interview summary of a victim, referred to as 'Victim-0', detailing her sexual abuse by Jeffrey Epstein, with Ghislaine Maxwell's frequent presence and facilitation. The document describes the progression of abuse, Maxwell's role in arranging travel and logistics, and specific incidents in Florida, New York, and California.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Described as the primary abuser who engaged in sexual acts with the victim and other girls, often in group settings in his massage room. He is portrayed as controlling, manipulative, and using his wealth to groom and isolate victims.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described as playing a central role in grooming the victim, normalizing sexual abuse, and actively participating in or directing group sexual encounters with Epstein and other girls. She positioned herself as a 'big sister' figure to the victim.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Called the victim to demand $10,000 for an apartment she was subletting, indicating financial control or entanglement after her relationship with Epstein ended.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as being present on a flight to New York and possibly visiting Epstein's ranch in New Mexico.

persons.name: Glen Dubin
persons.context: Mentioned as possibly being on a flight with the victim in May 1998. The victim states she liked him and that he was nice.

persons.name: Eva Dubin
persons.context: Mentioned as possibly being on a flight with the victim in May 1998. The victim states she liked her, thought she was cool, and that they hung out and drank together.

persons.name: Harvey Weinstein
persons.context: Met by the victim at a Golden Globes party with Epstein; Epstein told Weinstein 'hands off my girl'.

persons.name: Donald Trump
persons.context: The victim was asked about and denied being aware of any sexual abuse allegation involving Trump, stating rumors about her being a victim were not true.

connections.description: Described as working together to groom, abuse, and control the victim and other girls. Their relationship was a 'power couple dynamic' where Maxwell normalized and facilitated Epstein's abuse.
Epstein sexually abused the victim starting when she was a teenager, using manipulation, gifts, and a false sense of care to control her.
Maxwell groomed the victim, acting as a 'big sister' to normalize sexual abuse and actively participated in directing and participating in sexual encounters involving the victim.
Indyke is identified as Epstein's lawyer who contacted the victim about a financial debt related to an apartment.
Mark Epstein is identified as Jeffrey Epstein's brother and was present on some of the same flights.
Mentioned together as associates who were on flights and socialized with the victim. Eva Dubin is described as a friend of the victim.
The victim states she liked Eva, they hung out, drank together, and Eva introduced her to the drink White Russian. Eva was also involved in sexual conduct with Epstein.
Maxwell facilitated the victim's abuse by Epstein, was present during acts, arranged travel for abuse, and gave stern calls scolding the victim.
Epstein sexually abused the victim from age 14, including masturbation, oral sex, and rape, often with Maxwell present.
Epstein introduced the victim to Weinstein at a Golden Globes party and made a joking remark to him.

events.title: First Sexual Encounter with Epstein
events.description: The victim's first sexual encounter with Jeffrey Epstein occurred in the pool house at his Palm Beach property. She froze during the encounter, and Epstein acted as if everything was normal afterwards.

events.title: Group Sexual Encounters
events.description: Regular group sexual encounters occurred in Epstein's massage room involving Epstein, Maxwell, the victim, and other girls. Activities included massages, masturbation, oral sex, and intercourse, with Maxwell often directing the activities.

events.title: Epstein's Initial Arrest
events.description: The victim learned of Jeffrey Epstein's initial arrest (mid-2000s) and realized there were many other girls involved. She felt alone, horrible, and guilty for not having spoken up earlier.

events.title: FBI Interview of Victim
events.description: The victim is interviewed by the FBI and an AUSA, providing a detailed account of the abuse, grooming, and manipulation by Epstein and Maxwell, and the long-term impact on her life.

events.title: Travels to New Mexico
events.description: The victim traveled with Epstein and Maxwell to Epstein's ranch in New Mexico approximately three times via private jet. The purpose seemed to be to impress her, and activities included hiking.

events.title: FBI Interview of Victim-0
events.description: The victim provided detailed testimony about sexual abuse by Jeffrey Epstein, facilitated by Ghislaine Maxwell, spanning several years and locations.

events.title: Group Massage at Shutters on the Beach
events.description: A group massage incident in California where one girl was upset and cried because she had a boyfriend; Maxwell was not present.

events.title: Meeting Harvey Weinstein
events.description: Epstein introduced the victim to Harvey Weinstein at a Golden Globes party, telling Weinstein 'hands off my girl'.

events.title: Rape Incident in New York
events.description: The victim describes a rape by Epstein in New York, with subsequent pregnancy concerns as he never used protection.

keyFacts: The victim describes a systematic 'grooming process' by Epstein and Maxwell involving activities like bra shopping, going to movies, and hanging by the pool to normalize nudity and sexual behavior before any sexual acts occurred.
Ghislaine Maxwell played an active, directive role in the sexual abuse, coaching girls, telling them what to do during encounters, and creating a 'power couple dynamic' with Epstein.
Sexual encounters often involved multiple girls in group settings in Epstein's massage room, progressing from massages to various sexual acts, with Epstein never using protection.
The victim details travel on Epstein's private jet to locations like New York and New Mexico, with associates like Mark Epstein, Glen Dubin, and Eva Dubin sometimes present on flights.
The document reveals the long-term psychological impact on the victim, including trust issues, anxiety, depression, and damaged family relationships, stemming from the abuse and manipulation.
The victim (Victim-0) states Ghislaine Maxwell was present for most instances of sexual abuse by Jeffrey Epstein and facilitated the abuse by arranging travel and directing the victim to him.
The abuse began when the victim was 14 years old, starting with massages and escalating to oral sex and rape over several years in Florida and New York.
Maxwell gave the victim a vibrator as a Christmas gift, which the victim threw out due to embarrassment while living at home in high school.
The victim denied any awareness of sexual abuse allegations involving Donald Trump, stating rumors she was a victim were not true.
Epstein never used condoms during the abuse, leading the victim to have pregnancy concerns, including taking a pregnancy test after missing her period for six months.
